commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
menu "ST7789 Configuration"

    config GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        int
        default 48

    config WIDTH
        int "SCREEN WIDTH"
        range 0 999
        default 240
        help
            The width resolution of the screen.

    config HEIGHT
        int "SCREEN HEIGHT"
        range 0 999
        default 240
        help
            The height resolution of the screen.

    config OFFSETX
        int "GRAM X OFFSET"
        range 0 99
        default 0
        help
            When your TFT has an offset (X), set it.

    config OFFSETY
        int "GRAM Y OFFSET"
        range 0 99
        default 0
        help
            When your TFT has an offset (Y), set it.

    config MOSI_GPIO
        int "MOSI GPIO number"
        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 35
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI MOSI.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as MOSI.

    config SCLK_GPIO
        int "SCLK GPIO number"
        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 36
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI SCLK.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as SCLK.

    config CS_GPIO
        int "CS GPIO number"
        range -1 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default -1
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI CS.
            When it is -1, CS isn't performed.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as CS.

    config DC_GPIO
        int "DC GPIO number"
        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 40
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI DC.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as DC.

    config RESET_GPIO
        int "RESET GPIO number"
        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 41
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to RESET.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as RESET.

    config BL_GPIO
        int "BACKLIGHT GPIO number"
        range -1 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 33
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to BACKLIGHT.
            When it is -1, BACKLIGHT isn't performed.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as BACKLIGHT.

    config INVERSION
        bool "Enable Display Inversion"
        default false
        help
            Enable Display Inversion.

    choice SPI_HOST
        prompt "SPI peripheral that controls this bus"
        default SPI2_HOST
        help
            Select SPI peripheral that controls this bus.

        config SPI2_HOST
            bool "SPI2_HOST"
            help
                Use SPI2_HOST. This is also called HSPI_HOST.

        config SPI3_HOST
            bool "SPI3_HOST"
            help
                Use SPI3_HOST. This is also called VSPI_HOST.
    endchoice

endmenu
